subSections.title: Usage notes
subSections.text: 行 itself is also used as a radical (in addition to [[彳]]); unusually for radicals, the phonetic is placed in the ''middle'' – with 彳 on the left and 亍 on the right – corresponding to the phonetic originally being placed at the middle of the intersection.

subSections.title: Definitions
Usage notes
subSections.text: Notice that when meaning “be able to do something”, {{lang|zh|行}} can only be used without a complement. This is different from {{zh-l|能|to be able to (do something)}}.
